biography:
Jean-Pierre Bacri (born 24 May 1951, Castiglione [now Bou Ismaïl], Algeria - died 18 January 2021) is a French Jewish actor and screenwriter who frequently works in collaboration with Agnès Jaoui.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Jean-Pierre Bacri, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Jean-Pierre Bacri
